name: judge
description: Judge is a SaaS (Software as a Service) which aims to provide our open source software in a ready-to-use state, so that anyone with an interest in using it for supply-chain security can spin up our solutions quickly, easily, and effectively.

scripts.remotes:add-all: npm run remotes:add-archivista & npm run remotes:add-go-witness & npm run remotes:add-witness
scripts.start: cd dev && make deps && tmux has-session -t mysession 2>/dev/null || tmux new-session -d -s mysession 'make up' && tmux split-window -h 'minikube tunnel' && tmux select-layout even-horizontal && tmux attach-session -d -t mysession
scripts.subtrees:fetch:all: npm run subtrees:fetch:archivista & npm run subtrees:fetch:go-witness & npm run subtrees:fetch:witness
scripts.subtrees:pull:archivista: git subtree pull --prefix subtrees/archivista/ archivista main --squash
scripts.subtrees:pull:go-witness: git subtree pull --prefix subtrees/go-witness/ go-witness main --squash
scripts.subtrees:pull:witness: git subtree pull --prefix subtrees/witness/ witness main --squash
scripts.subtress:push:archivista: git subtree push --prefix subtrees/archivista/ archivista main
scripts.subtress:push:go-witness: git subtree push --prefix subtrees/go-witness/ go-witness main
scripts.subtress:push:witness: git subtree push --prefix subtrees/witness/ witness main
scripts.test:go: npm run test:archivista && npm run test:go-witness && npm run test:judge-api && npm run test:witness
scripts.test: npm run test:go && npm test -w web

author: TestifySec
